00040 TreeLibraryController::TreeLibraryController(TreeLibraryCtrl* treectrl)
00041 {
00042         // store Pointer to TreeCtrl
00043         m_treeCtrl = treectrl;
00044 
00045         // create image list
00046         createImageList();
00047 
00048         // create library
00049         m_library = new Library();
00050 
00051         // get pointer to Categories
00052         m_ptrCategories = m_library->getCategories();
00053 
00054         // get pointer to Entries
00055         m_ptrEntries = m_library->getEntries();
00056 
00057         // build treeCtrl
00058         buildTreeCtrl();
00059 }

00068 std::vector<wxString>* TreeLibraryController::getAllCategories()
00069 {
00070         // create pointer of a vector
00071         std::vector<wxString>* ptrCat =  new std::vector<wxString>;
00072 
00073         // iterator
00074         std::vector<LibraryCategory>::iterator it;
00075 
00076         // walk through all categories and store string into vector
00077         for (it = m_ptrCategories->begin(); it != m_ptrCategories->end(); it++)
00078         {
00079                 ptrCat->push_back(it->getName());
00080         }
00081 
00082         return ptrCat;
00083 }

00085 wxString TreeLibraryController::addEntry(wxString& name, wxInputStream& instream, wxString categoryname)
00086 {
00087         // if found
00088         bool found = false;
00089 
00090         // strings to store md5-hash
00091         wxString objHash;
00092         wxString xmlHash;
00093 
00094         // pointer to wxZipEntry
00095         wxZipEntry* entry;
00096 
00097         // make zip of inputStream
00098         wxZipInputStream inZip(instream);
00099 
00100         // entry to first inZip entry
00101         entry = inZip.GetNextEntry();
00102 
00103         // walk through all entries and look for xml and obj
00104         while (entry)
00105         {
00106                 // check if .xml
00107                 if (entry->GetName().Matches(wxT("*.xml")))
00108                 {
00109                         // make string of inputstream
00110                         wxStringOutputStream strout(&xmlHash);
00111 
00112                         // open zip stream
00113                         inZip.OpenEntry(*entry);
00114 
00115                         // read and write to strout
00116                         inZip.Read(strout);
00117 
00118                         // close zip entry
00119                         inZip.CloseEntry();
00120 
00121                         // get hash
00122                         xmlHash = MD5wxString(xmlHash);
00123                 }
00124 
00125                 if (entry->GetName().Matches(wxT("*.obj")))
00126                 {
00127                         // make string of inputstream
00128                         wxStringOutputStream strout(&objHash);
00129 
00130                         // open zip entry
00131                         inZip.OpenEntry(*entry);
00132 
00133                         // read and write to strout
00134                         inZip.Read(strout);
00135 
00136                         // close zip entry
00137                         inZip.CloseEntry();
00138 
00139                         // get hash
00140                         objHash = MD5wxString(objHash);
00141                 }
00142 
00143                 // get next Entry
00144                 entry = inZip.GetNextEntry();
00145         }
00146 
00147         // reset stream
00148         instream.SeekI(0);
00149 
00150         // reference
00151         wxString ref = objHash + xmlHash + wxT(".oax");
00152 
00153         // iterator
00154         std::vector<LibraryEntry>::iterator it;
00155 
00156         for (it = m_ptrEntries->begin(); it != m_ptrEntries->end(); it++)
00157         {
00158                 if (it->getReference() == ref)
00159                 {
00160                         // set found
00161                         found = true;
00162                 }
00163         }
00164 
00165         if (!found)
00166         {
00167                 // cat-id
00168                 unsigned int cat = addCategory(categoryname);
00169 
00170                 // new entry
00171                 m_ptrEntries->push_back(LibraryEntry(name, ref, cat));
00172 
00173                 // add physical to library
00174                 m_library->addEntry(ref, instream, m_newCat);
00175 
00176                 // rebuild
00177                 buildTreeCtrl();
00178         }
00179 
00180         return objHash + xmlHash;
00181 }

00183 unsigned int TreeLibraryController::addCategory(wxString& name)
00184 {
00185         // check if already exist
00186         m_newCat = true;
00187 
00188         // return
00189         unsigned int ret;
00190 
00191         // iterator
00192         std::vector<LibraryCategory>::iterator it;
00193 
00194         // walk through all categories
00195         for (it = m_ptrCategories->begin(); it != m_ptrCategories->end(); it++)
00196         {
00197                 // category found
00198                 if (it->getName() == name)
00199                 {
00200                         // set return
00201                         ret = it->getCategoryId();
00202 
00203                         // set found
00204                         m_newCat = false;
00205                 }
00206         }
00207 
00208         // not found, create new one
00209         if (m_newCat)
00210         {
00211                 // increment id
00212                 Library::m_categoryId += 1;
00213 
00214                 // new category
00215                 m_ptrCategories->push_back(LibraryCategory(name, Library::m_categoryId, 0));
00216 
00217                 // set return
00218                 ret = Library::m_categoryId;
00219         }
00220 
00221         // return
00222         return ret;
00223 }

00234 void TreeLibraryController::deleteEntry(wxString reference)
00235 {
00236         // iterator
00237         std::vector<LibraryEntry>::iterator it;
00238 
00239         // walk through all entries
00240         for (it = m_ptrEntries->begin(); it != m_ptrEntries->end(); it++)
00241         {
00242                 // look if correct entry
00243                 if ((it)->getReference() == reference)
00244                 {
00245                         // entry found
00246                         break;
00247                 }
00248         }
00249 
00250         // erase entry
00251         m_ptrEntries->erase(it);
00252 
00253         // delete physically
00254         m_library->deleteEntry(reference);
00255 
00256         // rebuild tree
00257         buildTreeCtrl();
00258 }

00260 void TreeLibraryController::renameCategory(wxString name, wxString newName)
00261 {
00262         // iterator
00263         std::vector<LibraryCategory>::iterator it;
00264 
00265         // walk through all categories
00266         for (it = m_ptrCategories->begin(); it != m_ptrCategories->end(); it++)
00267         {
00268                 // look if correct category
00269                 if ((it->getName() == name))
00270                 {
00271                         // set new name
00272                         (it)->setName(newName);
00273                 }
00274         }
00275 
00276         // change name in xml
00277         m_library->renameCategory(name, newName);
00278 
00279         // rebuild tree
00280         buildTreeCtrl();
00281 }

00311 void TreeLibraryController::pasteEntry(wxString reference)
00312 {
00313         // oax import
00314         OaxImport import;
00315 
00316         // get scene and prepare assembly
00317         Scene* scene = Scene::getInstance();
00318         Assembly* assembly;
00319 
00320         //query scene for hash or load from file
00321         assembly = scene->getOrigialFromHash(reference.BeforeFirst('.'));
00322 
00323         //found one, just clone from
00324         if (assembly != NULL)
00325         {
00326                 //overwrite pointer here
00327                 assembly = assembly->clone();
00328 
00329                 //reset clone
00330                 assembly->setXYZ(0.0,0.0,0.0);
00331                 assembly->setPhi(0.0);
00332                 assembly->setRho(0.0);
00333                 assembly->setTheta(0.0);
00334         }
00335         //or load from library container
00336         else
00337         {
00338                 // wxMemoryOutputStream to store oax data
00339                 wxMemoryOutputStream* memOut;
00340 
00341                 // get data
00342                 memOut = m_library->getEntryData(reference);
00343 
00344                 // wxMemoryInputStream to store oax data
00345                 wxMemoryInputStream memIn(*memOut);
00346 
00347                 // wxZipInputStream
00348                 wxZipInputStream inZip(memIn);
00349 
00350                 // import
00351                 import.Load(inZip);
00352 
00353                 // assembly pointer
00354                 assembly = import.getAssembly();
00355 
00356                 // set hash
00357                 assembly->setHash(reference.BeforeFirst('.'));
00358 
00359                 // delete memOut
00360                 delete memOut;
00361         }
00362 
00363         // insert assembly
00364         scene->insertAssembly(assembly);
00365 
00366         // update gl
00367         scene->glRefresh();
00368 }

00371 {
00372         return m_library->getEntryData(reference);
00373 }

00375 void TreeLibraryController::createImageList(int size)
00376 {
00377         // Make an image list containing small icons
00378         wxImageList *images = new wxImageList(size, size, true);
00379 
00380         // should correspond to TreeCtrlIcon_xxx enum
00381         wxBusyCursor wait;
00382 
00383         // 3 icons
00384         wxIcon icons[3];
00385         icons[0] = wxIcon(icon_library_container_xpm);
00386         icons[1] = wxIcon(icon_library_folder_xpm);
00387         icons[2] = wxIcon(icon_library_assembly_xpm);
00388 
00389         int sizeOrig = icons[0].GetWidth();
00390 
00391         for (size_t i = 0; i < WXSIZEOF(icons); i++)
00392         {
00393                 if (size == sizeOrig)
00394                 {
00395                         images->Add(icons[i]);
00396                 }
00397                 else
00398                 {
00399                         images->Add(wxBitmap(wxBitmap(icons[i]).ConvertToImage().Rescale(size, size)));
00400                 }
00401         }
00402 
00403         // asign images
00404         m_treeCtrl->AssignImageList(images);
00405 }

00410 void TreeLibraryController::buildTreeCtrl()
00411 {
00412         // delete old tree
00413         m_treeCtrl->DeleteAllItems();
00414 
00415         // local map to store categoryid and wxTreeItemId
00416         std::map<unsigned int, wxTreeItemId> catId;
00417 
00418         // category iterator
00419         std::vector<LibraryCategory>::iterator catit;
00420 
00421         // entry iterator
00422         std::vector<LibraryEntry>::iterator entit;
00423 
00424         // category-id iterator
00425         std::map<unsigned int, wxTreeItemId>::iterator catIdit;
00426 
00427         // local wxTreeItemId
00428         wxTreeItemId tiid;
00429         wxTreeItemId root;
00430 
00431         // new itemdata
00432         TreeLibraryItemData* itemData = new TreeLibraryItemData();
00433 
00434         // set category
00435         itemData->setCat(true);
00436 
00437         // set root
00438         root = tiid = m_treeCtrl->AddRoot(wxT("Bibliothek"), -1, -1, itemData);
00439 
00440         // set root image
00441         m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(tiid, (int)TreeCtrlIcon_Root);
00442 
00443         // store root tiid
00444         catId.insert(std::pair<unsigned int, wxTreeItemId>(0, tiid));
00445 
00446         // walk through all categories and append to tree control
00447         for (catit = m_ptrCategories->begin(); catit != m_ptrCategories->end(); catit++)
00448         {
00449                 // new itemdata
00450                 TreeLibraryItemData* itemData = new TreeLibraryItemData();
00451 
00452                 // set category
00453                 itemData->setCat(true);
00454                 itemData->setName(catit->getName());
00455 
00456                 // append to treectrl
00457                 tiid = m_treeCtrl->AppendItem(catId[catit->getParentId()], catit->getName(), -1, -1, itemData);
00458 
00459                 // set image
00460                 m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(tiid, (int)TreeCtrlIcon_Folder);
00461 
00462                 // store tiid into map
00463                 catId.insert(std::pair<unsigned int, wxTreeItemId>(catit->getCategoryId(), tiid));
00464         }
00465 
00466         // walk through all entrys and append to tree control
00467         for (entit = m_ptrEntries->begin(); entit != m_ptrEntries->end(); entit++)
00468         {
00469                 // new itemdata
00470                 TreeLibraryItemData* itemData = new TreeLibraryItemData();
00471 
00472                 // set assembly
00473                 itemData->setCat(false);
00474                 itemData->setName(entit->getReference());
00475 
00476                 // append to treectrl
00477                 tiid = m_treeCtrl->AppendItem(catId[entit->getCategoryId()], entit->getName(), -1, -1, itemData);
00478 
00479                 // set image
00480                 m_treeCtrl->SetItemImage(tiid, (int)TreeCtrlIcon_Assembly);
00481         }
00482 
00483         // sort
00484         for (catIdit = catId.begin(); catIdit != catId.end(); catIdit++)
00485         {
00486                 m_treeCtrl->SortChildren(catIdit->second);
00487         }
00488 
00489         // expand root
00490         m_treeCtrl->Expand(root);
00491 }
